0600/A0/04/903/009.indicator_name: Guidelines/ manual for community volunteers is developed and finalized by 2011

0600/A0/04/101/002.indicator_name: Health facilities that provide SAM treatment services
0600/A0/04/101/002.headline: While the roll-out of key nutrition interventions like cIYCF are under way as planned  there have been delays with IMAM due to Government staff turnover and Government's requirement to finalise the IMAM operational strategy. Additional states/regions planned in 2017 have also not been reached.

0600/A0/04/101/001.indicator_name: Adoption of the International Code on Marketing of Breastmilk substitutes as legislation and subsequent relevant World Health Assembly resolutions
0600/A0/04/101/001.headline: Ongoing efforts by SUN stakeholders  including UNICEF  to support Government has led to near completion of a comprehensive national nutrition stocktaking exercise. Findings will enable prioritization under a national costed-plan  however MOHS as the lead Ministry is still in process of deciding the timeline and process for plan development.

0600/A0/04/101/001.indicator_name: A multi-sectoral and costed  Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) operational plan is in place that includes clear targets especially for the most vulnerable groups.                             Scale: 0 (not established)  1 (draft plan exists)  2 (draft plan is costed)  3 (plan is endorsed by Government)  4 (plan is operational)
0600/A0/04/101/001.headline: Ongoing efforts by SUN stakeholders  including UNICEF  to support Government has led to near completion of a comprehensive national nutrition stocktaking exercise. Findings will enable prioritization under a national costed-plan  however MOHS as the lead Ministry is still in process of deciding the timeline and process for plan development.

0600/A0/04/101/001.indicator_name: International Code of Marketing of Breast-Milk Substitutes is adopted as legislation  and a system for monitoring and enforcement is established.   Scale: 0 (no existence)  1 (order drafted)  2 (order adapted)  3 (monitoring and enforcement system is established)
0600/A0/04/101/001.headline: Ongoing efforts by SUN stakeholders  including UNICEF  to support Government has led to near completion of a comprehensive national nutrition stocktaking exercise.
